definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: It's good we checked the time of the train.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我们核查了火车时刻。

sentences.english: It was fine at first; most of my friends had moved home too.
sentences.chinese: 起初我觉得还好，我的很多朋友也都回家投靠父母了。

sentences.english: Thankfully, I have a trusted seller in Shenzen.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我在深圳有个可信赖的卖家。

sentences.english: Pvt. James Frederick, Ryan Well, does that - does that mean my brothers are OK.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德里克那意味着他们还好吧？

sentences.english: Fortunately, there are two bullet casings, know who took part in target practice.
sentences.chinese: 还好，有两个子弹壳，知道自己曾经参加过打靶。

sentences.english: I hate it when nine-year olds have a better phone than I do.
sentences.chinese: 最讨厌看见九岁小孩拿的手机比我的还好。

sentences.english: May be hard to pull off in some hilly cities.
sentences.chinese: 在平原城市还好，在丘陵城市就有点吃力了。

sentences.english: It makes pretty good money. The hours are ok.
sentences.chinese: 会计师可以赚蛮多钱，工作时间也还好。

sentences.english: My sister stayed the night with me.
sentences.chinese: 还好妹妹一直陪着我过了那夜。

sentences.english: O. K. didn't humiliate this, otherwise, I will likewise dead to have no whole corpseses.
sentences.chinese: 还好没有欺负到这小子头上，不然，我也会死无全尸。

sentences.english: But I was learning really quickly. I got used to it after a break.
sentences.chinese: 还好我学得快，过了课间休息后我就顺应过来了。

sentences.english: Good thing he had Andrew Bynum and a couple of keyed-up reserve guards as teammates.
sentences.chinese: 还好他有安猪以及一帮牛逼哄哄的后卫这些队友。

sentences.english: It's okay to fly but it is a pain on very long flights or when there is bad turbulence.
sentences.chinese: 坐飞机还好，关头是飞飓久挺常人的，或者赶上气流。

sentences.english: Minwoo asked her if she is OK.

definition: if it were not for/but for
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to appear to be/to seem as if
